Subskills.name: Soulburn
Subskills.description: Increases the tick frequency of dark oath.

Subskills.name: Oath Amplifier
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by dark oath.

Subskills.name: Sacrificial Oath
Subskills.description: Each pulse unleashes multiple restless spirits.

Subskills.name: Healing Corruption
Subskills.description: Chance to recover a portion of your maximum life on hit.

Subskills.name: Shadows Reach
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of dark oath.

Subskills.name: Covens Oath
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned targets.

Subskills.name: Pulse of Vitality
Subskills.description: Chance to increase your life and mana replenish on hit for a short duration.

Subskills.name: Lust for Power
Subskills.description: Chance to critically hit with increased critical strike damage.

Subskills.name: Burning Darkness
Subskills.description: Inflicts shadow burn and slow on hit.

Subskills.name: Shadowsteps
Subskills.description: Chance to increase your movement speed on hit for a short duration.

Subskills.name: Intrusive Corruption
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict arcane break on hit.

Subskills.name: Devastating Pulse
Subskills.description: Chance to stun monsters on hit.

Subskills.name: Soul Collector
Subskills.description: Dark oath pulses collect souls from monsters. After reaching the maximum stack of souls the next pulse will deal increased damage with increased area of effect radius.

Subskills.name: Corrupting Pulse
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash additional pulses of dark oath from monsters on hit.
